jobs_results.title: Mobile Developer Trainee
jobs_results.company_name: 607 Stora Enso Wood Products Zdirec s.r.o.
jobs_results.description: Mobile Developer Trainee (Part-time Trainee Position) Stora Enso is a leading provider of renewable products in packaging, biomaterials, and wooden construction, and one of the largest private forest owners in the world. At Stora Enso, we believe that everything made from fossil-based materials today can be made from a tree tomorrow. We employ approximately 20,000 people globally. Career for a better climate. Every day. Are you passionate about mobile development? Would you like to gain valuable hands-on experience while pursuing your studies? Are you available to work 20 hours per week until August 2026? We are seeking a motivated Flutter (Dart) or Android Mobile Developer Trainee to join our innovative IT and development team in the Forest Division. In this role, you will contribute to building modern mobile applications that empower our organization and customers, helping drive forward our mission of sustainability and digital innovation. You will be located in our office - Organica in Ostrava, Czechia. Key Responsibilities: Mobile App Development: Assist in developing and maintaining Flutter (Dart) mobile applications, focusing on both Android and iOS compatibility. UI/UX Implementation: Help design and implement intuitive, user-friendly interfaces that enhance customer and employee experiences. Bug Fixing and Optimization: Identify and resolve issues in existing mobile applications, ensuring performance and stability. API Integration: Collaborate with backend developers to integrate REST APIs and ensure seamless data communication between apps and server systems. Documentation: Maintain detailed technical documentation to support project workflows and future development. Collaboration: Work closely with senior developers, project managers, and other stakeholders to align app development with business goals. Qualifications Currently pursuing a degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, IT, or a related field. Basic understanding of mobile app development using Flutter (Dart) or experience with Android development. Familiarity with version control tools like Git. Knowledge of REST APIs and app lifecycle management is a plus. Experience with Firebase or other backend services is a bonus. A passion for mobile app development, problem-solving, and attention to detail. Good communication skills and proficiency in English for collaboration with global teams. What We Offer By joining us, you will become part of a diverse, forward-thinking culture where you‚Äôll gain hands-on experience in mobile development while contributing to a more sustainable future. Your work will support Stora Enso‚Äôs mission to lead the way in sustainable innovation. We also care deeply about your wellbeing, offering resources to help you thrive both physically and mentally. Role specific opportunities/things that we offer: modern office in Ostrava - we apply hybrid model 5 weeks of vacation per year lunch cards 160 CZK commuting allowance cafeteria pension insurance annual bonus How to Apply Submit your application through our recruitment portal. Applications will be reviewed on an ongoing basis, so we encourage you to apply as soon as possible, but no later than 26 January 2025. Our recruitment process may include video interviews, aptitude tests, and pre-employment checks such as reference, background, and health assessments, as well as a drug test. If you have any questions, feel free to contact our TA Partner Lucie Sta≈àkov√°, lucie.stankova@storaenso.com. √Ñr du nyfiken och vill jobba med innovation inom f√∂rnybara produkter? V√•rt syfte ‚ÄùG√∂ra gott f√∂r m√§nniskor och planeten. Ers√§tt icke-f√∂rnybara material med f√∂rnybara produkter‚Äù underbygger v√•r √∂vertygelse om att allt som kan g√∂ras med fossilbaserade material idag kan g√∂ras av ett tr√§d imorgon, och lyfter fram Stora Ensos m√∂jlighet att bidra till en gr√∂nare ekonomi. Ta en titt p√• v√•ra lediga tj√§nster! P√• Stora Enso kommer du att sl√• dig samman med cirka 22 000 kollegor ‚Äì ett brett spektrum av m√§nniskor med olika bakgrunder och f√§rdigheter, alla fokuserade p√• potentialen hos biomaterial, papper, f√∂rpackningar och tr√§konstruktion. Presentera dig f√∂r v√•ra rekryterare s√• h√∂r vi av oss om det finns en roll som verkar passa dig. Hos oss kommer du bidra till en mer h√•llbar v√§rld, eftersom vi tror att allt som idag g√∂rs av fossilbaserat material kan g√∂ras av ett tr√§d imorgon. Med v√•ra v√§rderingar i Stora Enso, ‚ÄùTa ledningen‚Äù och ‚ÄùG√∂r det r√§tta‚Äù, f√∂rv√§ntar vi oss h√∂g prestation, snabbhet och smidighet i varje del av v√•r organisation. S√§kerhet och v√§lbefinnande √§r v√•r h√∂gsta prioritet varje dag. Vi inspirerar dig att leda din utveckling och att ha h√∂ga ambitioner. Vi tror att m√•ngfald st√§rker v√•r konkurrenskraft och bidrar till b√§ttre beslutsfattande. Olika arbetsgrupper med olika bakgrund hj√§lper oss att utforska olika perspektiv och utmanar v√•rt s√§tt att t√§nka. Vi arbetar aktivt f√∂r att √∂ka m√•ngfalden p√• arbetsplatsen och v√§lkomnar s√∂kande med olika bakgrund. Stora Enso √§r en arbetsgivare f√∂r lika m√∂jligheter som f√∂ljer icke-diskriminerande metoder. F√∂rbered dig inf√∂r v√•r rekryteringsprocess genom att utforska den angivna sidan: Hur du s√∂ker en tj√§nst ‚Äì Karri√§r | Stora Enso Beroende p√• placering och niv√•n p√• tj√§nsten kan den normala rekryteringsprocessen √§ven innefatta videointervju, l√§mplighetstester och f√∂rberedande √•tg√§rder som bakgrundskontroller, referenser, h√§lsokontroll och drogtest som en del av de sista stegen. Du kommer att informeras om vad som √§r till√§mpligt f√∂r rollen under rekryteringsprocessen. Privacy Statement Legal Notice

Internet of Things - t√≠m se li≈°√≠me od bƒõ≈æn√Ωch firem. Vyv√≠j√≠me toti≈æ nejen software, ale i chytr√Ω hardware, tak≈æe u n√°s mimo nesmyslnƒõ velk√Ωch monitor≈Ø naraz√≠te tak√© na 3D tisk√°rny, chytr√© kolobƒõ≈æky, sekaƒçky, pumpy nebo t≈ôeba sledovac√≠ za≈ô√≠zen√≠ pro zv√≠≈ôata.

jobs_results.title: Computer Scientist (m/f/d) as App Developer for iOS / Android
jobs_results.description:
Computer Scientist (m/f/d) as App Developer for iOS / Android
RIWA - All geoinformation becomes a digital experience

RIWA GmbH is a leading company in the field of geoinformation and municipal specialist processes with over 25 years of experience and market leader in Bavaria. Our team develops innovative solutions for the digital transformation of cities and municipalities, in particular through geographic information systems (GIS). We also create digital twins of municipalities for construction planning, energy management and sustainable urban development. We offer customized solutions and attach great importance to close cooperation.

Become part of our team in one of our branches in Augsburg, Memmingen or Kempten im Allg√É¬§u. After training, you can also work from home.
These are your tasks
‚Ä¢ Further development of our native RIWA GIS Android app
‚Ä¢ Implementation of our previous apps for Apple iOS with Kotlin & Compose Multiplatform
‚Ä¢ Quality assurance through code reviews, unit tests and automated test procedures
‚Ä¢ Technical conceptualization of functional requirements from product management
‚Ä¢ Advising product management on development issues
You know your way around this
‚Ä¢ Completed studies in computer science or equivalent training
‚Ä¢ Sound knowledge in the development of Android apps (Kotlin, Java, Android SDK). Basic knowledge of iOS development advantageous (Swift)
‚Ä¢ Ideally experience with Jetpack Compose, Kotlin Multiplatform and Compose Multiplatform
‚Ä¢ Expertise with automated tests, CI/CD processes and agile software development
‚Ä¢ Knowledge of designing appealing user interfaces is a plus
‚Ä¢ Independent working style, ability to work in a team and a high level of self-motivation
What we offer you
‚Ä¢ A great team - #GernePerDu - and a varied job in the office and home office
‚Ä¢ Attractive salary, 13 monthly salaries, capital-forming benefits and a performance bonus
‚Ä¢ Family-friendly working time models with flexible working hours (flexitime)
‚Ä¢ Corporate benefits such as a job bike, drinks flat rate or employee discounts with over 1,500 providers
‚Ä¢ Intensive training in the field of activity and regular further training
‚Ä¢ An exciting environment with varied tasks
‚Ä¢ A secure, modern workplace close to the city center with future prospects
Have we piqued your interest?

Please send us your complete application documents directly online via our applicant management system, stating your salary expectations and the earliest possible starting date.
RIWA GmbH

An der Neum√É¬ºhle 5, 87700 Memmingen
Everyone is welcome at RIWA. Diversity and equal opportunities are an integral part of our company. We see the uniqueness of each individual, and therefore the diversity of our teams, as the driving force behind our daily work and innovations. - We look forward to meeting you.

+

Online application

jobs_results.title: Middle/Senior Mobile Flutter Software Engineers
jobs_results.description:
This a Full Remote job, the offer is available from: Europe, Belarus, Poland, Kazakhstan

We are looking for experienced Middle/Senior Mobile Flutter Software Engineers to join our core product ‚Äì BOSS Revolution.

You have a chance to work with a team of outstanding professionals on a challenging product.

You will never be bored‚Äîour team is dynamic, as are our products. Be ready to face thrilling professional challenges and use your strong hard and soft skills to solve them as a Team player.

Your primary responsibility is end-to-end development and support of our user experience in our customer-facing apps.

Join us if you want to:
‚Ä¢ Have a unique work experience with a really strong engineering team!
‚Ä¢ Become a part of a multinational and cross-functional team.
‚Ä¢ Boost your career with a big international product company and have new growth opportunities.
‚Ä¢ Work on new innovative features and bug fixes in a Scrum Team.
‚Ä¢ Take responsibility for the full software development life-cycle.
‚Ä¢ Collaborate with business stakeholders and be a part of the product development team.
‚Ä¢ Demonstrate your technology-agnostic positive attitude with the ability to learn and desire to implement solutions using various technologies.
‚Ä¢ Work on high-performing, mission-critical, scalable, and resilient applications and services.
‚Ä¢ Drive aggressive technical debt reduction in close collaboration with developers and automation test engineers.
Join us, if you have:
‚Ä¢ Have around one year of Flutter cross-platform development experience.
‚Ä¢ Have 5+ years of hands-on mobile development experience (Android and/or iOS).
‚Ä¢ Are truly passionate about mobile development.
‚Ä¢ Can communicate in English (B2+).
‚Ä¢ Are a constant learner.
You can please us with:
‚Ä¢ Experience in configuring mobile CI pipelines.
‚Ä¢ Knowledge and experience beyond mobile stack.
We offer you:
‚Ä¢ An exciting and challenging job with talented people around.
‚Ä¢ Really good hardware (a laptop with 32 GB RAM and 512 GB SSD).
‚Ä¢ Competitive salary and growth opportunities.
‚Ä¢ Remote work opportunity (with the opportunity to work from offices in Minsk and Warsaw).
‚Ä¢ Superb English lessons.A few words about us:

IDT Corporation is a global communications company founded in 1990 and headquartered in Newark, New Jersey. We are industry leaders in prepaid communication and payment services and one of the largest international voice carriers. We are listed on the NYSE, employ over 1800 people across 20 countries, and have over $1.5 billion in revenues.

We are not ‚Äùanother big IT corporation‚Äù‚Äî we encourage and support in-house entrepreneurs in developing their ideas into business actions.

Our flagship brand, Boss Revolution, offers Money Transfer, International Calling, and Mobile Top-Up services and supports IDT‚Äôs mission of enabling people to keep in touch and share resources with family and friends worldwide.

If you are here, it seems like you are interested, so let‚Äôs chat! üòâ

This offer from "IDT Corporation" has been enriched by Jobgether.com and got a 77% flex score.

jobs_results.title: Sr. Android Engineer
jobs_results.description:
Fingerprint empowers developers to stop online fraud at the source.

We work on turning radical new ideas in the fraud detection space into reality. Our products are developer-focused and our clients range from solo developers to publicly traded companies. We are a globally dispersed, 100% remote company with a strong open-source focus. Our flagship open-source project is FingerprintJS (20K stars on GitHub).

We have raised $77M and are backed by Craft Ventures (previously invested in Tesla, Facebook, Airbnb ), Nexus Venture Partners (previously invested in Postman , Apollo.io, MinIO , Druva) and Uncorrelated Ventures (previously invested in Redis, Rollbar &Gradle ).

Who We Are Looking For: We are looking for a Senior Android Engineer with a solid background in Information Security. The ideal candidate will have experience building Android applications or libraries from scratch and will be skilled in security frameworks, cryptography, and network protocols. The role requires strong expertise in Kotlin, and familiarity with Jetpack Compose is preferred.

Key Responsibilities:
‚Ä¢ Design, develop, and optimize native Android applications and libraries, focusing on security, scalability, and performance.
‚Ä¢ Collaborate with cross-functional teams to implement security protocols and ensure that applications align with best security practices.
‚Ä¢ Build developer tools that enhance productivity and streamline the development process.
‚Ä¢ Contribute to the maintenance and advancement of security frameworks for mobile applications.
‚Ä¢ Provide mentorship to junior team members and contribute to their technical development.

Requirements:
‚Ä¢ Education: Degree in Computer Science, Information Security, or equivalent experience.
‚Ä¢ Experience:
‚Ä¢ 5+ years as a Senior Android Engineer (prior experience in a Senior Android role is required).
‚Ä¢ Strong Information Security background, with practical experience in:
‚Ä¢ Network protocols and secure coding practices
‚Ä¢ Cryptography and security framework development
‚Ä¢ Proven experience in building Android applications from the ground up, with expertise in Kotlin and vanilla Android SDKs. Experience with Jetpack Compose is preferred.
‚Ä¢ Experience with Android NDK is a plus.
‚Ä¢ Contributions to Open Source projects on GitHub are a bonus.

Offers vary depending on, but not limited to, relevant experience, education, certifications/licenses, skills, training, and market conditions.

Due to regulatory and security reasons, there‚Äôs a small number of countries where we cannot have Fingerprint teammates based. Additionally, because Fingerprint is an all-remote company and people can join our workforce from almost any country, we do not sponsor visas. Fingerprint teammates need to be authorized to work from their home location .

We are dedicated to creating an inclusive work environment for everyone. We embrace and celebrate the unique experiences, perspectives and cultural backgrounds that each employee brings to our workplace. Fingerprint strives to foster an environment where our employees feel respected, valued and empowered, and our team members are at the forefront in helping us promote and sustain an inclusive workplace. We highly encourage people from underrepresented groups in tech to apply.

If you are applying as a resident of California, please read our CCPA notice here

If you are applying as a resident of the EU, please read our GDPR notice here
